snippet: A Philadelphia priest and a schoolteacher sexually abused a 10-year-old boy at different times more than a decade ago, a prosecutor alleged.
abstract: Trial begins in Philadelphia for Roman Catholic priest Rev Charles Engelhardt, and Catholic schoolteacher Bernard Shero, both accused of sexually abusing a 10-year-old alter boy at different times more than a decade ago.
lead_paragraph: A Philadelphia priest and a schoolteacher sexually abused a 10-year-old boy at different times more than a decade ago, a prosecutor alleged.

headline.seo: Trial Begins for Philadelphia Priest and Teacher Accused of Sexually Abusing Altar Boy
headline.main: Trial Begins for Priest and Teacher Accused of Abusing Altar Boy
headline.print_headline: Trial Begins for Priest and Teacher Accused of Abusing Altar Boy
